ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: EBGU - Modernisering af flåden i Ukrposhta
EBWE - Projekt zur Flottenerneuerung - Ukrposhta
EBRD - Ukrposhta Fleet Renewal Project
BERD - Proyecto de renovación de flota en Ukrposhta

ΕΤΑΑ - Σχέδιο ανανέωσης του στόλου της Ukrposhta

TI_DOC.P: EBGU - Modernisering af flåden i Ukrposhta (UA-Kyiv)

CONTENTS.P: Project name: Ukrposhta Fleet Renewal
Country: Ukraine
Business sector: Transport
Project ID: 48915
Funding source: EBRD
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: General procurement notice
Issue date: 12.2.2018
Closing date: 12.2.2019

Ukrposhta Public Joint Stock Company (“the Company”), a national postal services operator in Ukraine, has applied for loan financing from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (“the Bank” or “EBRD”) to finance the renewal of Company’s courier delivery vehicles' fleet. The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of EUR 16 000 000 equivalent will require the procurement of the following goods, works and services using the proceeds of the loan:
— Lorries or minivans and associated equipment for customer parcels delivery / collecting / shipment.
Tendering for the above contracts is expected to begin in the Q2 of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of the loan from the EBRD will be subject to the EBRD Procurement Policies and Rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the EBRD loans will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the Purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers and contractors should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ATTENTION: Ms Victoria Vystoropska, Manager of Tender Procedures Department

CONTENTS.P: Project name: Ukrposhta Fleet Renewal
Country: Ukraine
Business sector: Transport
Project ID: 48915
Funding source: EBRD
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: General procurement notice
Issue date: 12.2.2018
Closing date: 12.2.2019

Ukrposhta Public Joint Stock Company (“the Company”), a national postal services operator in Ukraine, has applied for loan financing from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (“the Bank” or “EBRD”) to finance the renewal of Company’s courier delivery vehicles' fleet. The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of EUR 16 000 000 equivalent will require the procurement of the following goods, works and services using the proceeds of the loan:
— Lorries or minivans and associated equipment for customer parcels delivery / collecting / shipment.
Tendering for the above contracts is expected to begin in the Q2 of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of the loan from the EBRD will be subject to the EBRD Procurement Policies and Rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the EBRD loans will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the Purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers and contractors should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ATTENTION: Ms Victoria Vystoropska, Manager of Tender Procedures Department
